scripts.script:GenerateDeployers: forge script script/GenerateDeployers.s.sol && forge fmt test/helpers/deployers/*.sol
scripts.env:setup:mainnet: cp .envrc.mainnet.sample .envrc.mainnet && echo '✅ Created .envrc.mainnet - Please edit it with your configuration'
scripts.env:setup:testnet: cp .envrc.testnet.sample .envrc.testnet && echo '✅ Created .envrc.testnet - Please edit it with your configuration'
scripts.env:switch:mainnet: ln -sf .envrc.mainnet .envrc && direnv allow && echo '✅ Switched to mainnet environment'
scripts.env:switch:testnet: ln -sf .envrc.testnet .envrc && direnv allow && echo '✅ Switched to testnet environment'
